general.question: Why do you want to work for this company?
How do you cope with pressure?
Why are you leaving your job?
What are your goals for the future?
What can you offer our company?
What do you do when you make a mistake at work?
What is your biggest career dream?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Have you ever had conflicts with coworkers or bosses? How did you handle it?
Why do you think you're the right person for this job?
What do you expect from this position?
How would you handle an impossible deadline?
What would you do if you disagreed with your manager?

developer.question: Which programming language are you most proficient in? Can you explain a project where you used it?
How do you structure your code to ensure maintainability and scalability?
Describe a complex bug you solved. How did you approach the problem?
Have you ever optimized a slow-performing system? What techniques did you use?
How do you handle feedback in code reviews?
Do you contribute to open-source projects or have a GitHub portfolio?
How do you handle technical debt in a project? Can you give an example?
What’s your approach to debugging a problem you’ve never seen before?
What’s your process for reviewing someone else’s code? What do you look for?
Have you ever missed a deadline? What happened, and how did you handle it?
Describe a recent technical concept you learned. How did you apply it (or plan to)?
